auto_layout_confirm_text: Auto-layout will overwrite saved node positions. Cancel to keep current positions or Reorder to apply automatic layout.
No_data: No data – Adapter might be offline or no panel configured.
touch_hint_buttons: For operating buttons from other flows a double tap is required
delete_confirm_text: Do you really want to delete this item?
select_description: Select an item from the list on the left to edit its configuration.
headline: Headline
nav_next_tooltip: If 'Next' points to a page whose 'Prev' points to a different page, that page will be inserted and the next/prev of the other pages adjusted accordingly. In conflicts, 'prev' has priority.
nav_prev_tooltip: If 'Prev' points to a page whose 'Next' points to a different page, that page will be inserted and the next/prev of the other pages adjusted accordingly. In conflicts, 'prev' has priority.
nav_target_only_notice: Without next and prev this page can only be reached via { navigate: 'true', targetPage: 'abc'}
nav_all_requires_prev_next: For (all) prev or next must be set
unlock_setnavi_hint: Optional: NSPanel page to open on unlock — must be the page's uniqueName.
unlock_setnavi_placeholder: UniqueName of the page to be opened (optional)
